headline: RBC Capital Lowers its Price Target on Autodesk, Inc. (ADSK) to $340 and Maintains an Outperform Rating
summary: Autodesk, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADSK) is among the 10 Best Consensus Buy-Rated Stocks to Invest in. On February 11, 2026, RBC Capital analyst Matthew Hedberg lowered the firm’s price target on Autodesk, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADSK) to $340 from $380 and maintained an Outperform rating as part of a broader research note ahead of Q4 earnings in software. The […]
